== Bali (626949) ==
      
Bali is a village in the [[Quepem]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 927 hectares and harbouring 705 households with total population of 2944 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CUNCOLIM]] is at a distance of 3 km. Male population is 1458 and female population is 1486. Scheduled Caste Population is 54 and Scheduled Tribes population is 821. Census Location Code of the village is 626949<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
